item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

go to player.java search for Giving player the unique look
and it will look some what like this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=7394; playerEquipment[playerCape]=2412; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1712; playerEquipment[playerChest]=6107; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=7382; playerEquipment[playerHands]=3391; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3393; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=6528; change all the numbers to the item code

Hope this Helpes

Read full topic
